title: Issue #6: Manager list deletion fix
details:
Fixed Issue #6 where Manager panel list doesn't update when last Quick Tab closed.

Root cause: Cache protection logic (_isSuspiciousStorageDrop, _detectStorageStorm) was treating 1→0 tab transitions as storage corruption instead of legitimate deletions.

Fix approach:
1. Updated _isSuspiciousStorageDrop() to recognize single-tab deletions (1→0) as legitimate
2. Updated _detectStorageStorm() to clear cache for legitimate single-tab deletions
3. Updated _handleEmptyStorageState() and _updateInMemoryCache() to properly clear cache
4. Added handleStateDeletedMessage() in Manager to handle deletion messages from background
5. Updated DestroyHandler to notify background via QUICK_TAB_STATE_CHANGE with deleted:true
6. Updated background.js handleQuickTabStateChange() to process deletion changes

Key files: sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js, background.js, src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/DestroyHandler.js
